Package Number.Base.Converter.Examples

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BinaryToDecimalConversion
    Binary to decimal conversion is one of the most used, and can be seen below
    CustomBase
    A great advantage of JNBC is the possibility to create your own custom bases, and can be seen below
    CustomBaseToCustomBaseConversion
    In JNBC, it is possible to convert two bases created
    Formatting
    Sometimes you need to change the way numbers appear, so you can use the Formatter class to format numbers
    HexadecimalToDecimalConversion
    Hexadecimal to decimal conversion is one of the most used, and can be seen below.
    NegativeConversion
    No problem if the numbers are negative, below you can find examples of this.
    OctalToDecimalConversion
    The octal to decimal conversion is one of the most used, and can be seen below.
